00023 #include "ServicePool.h"
00024 static ServicePool *instance=NULL;
00025 static map<string,Service> servicePool;
00026 ServicePool::ServicePool()
00027 {
00028         instance = NULL;
00029 }
00030 
00031 ServicePool::~ServicePool() {
00032         // TODO Auto-generated destructor stub
00033 }
00034 
00035 ServicePool* ServicePool::getInstance()
00036 {
00037         if(instance==NULL)
00038                 instance = new ServicePool;
00039         return instance;
00040 }
00041 
00042 string ServicePool::registerService(string name,Service service)// will return a unique identification for this service
00043 {
00044         time_t rawtime;
00045     struct tm * timeinfo;
00046     time(&rawtime);
00047         timeinfo = localtime(&rawtime);
00048         timespec en;
00049         clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &en);
00050 
00051         string yr = boost::lexical_cast<string>(timeinfo->tm_year);
00052         string mo = boost::lexical_cast<string>(timeinfo->tm_mon);
00053         string da = boost::lexical_cast<string>(timeinfo->tm_mday);
00054         string hr = boost::lexical_cast<string>(timeinfo->tm_hour);
00055         string mm = boost::lexical_cast<string>(timeinfo->tm_min);
00056         string ms = boost::lexical_cast<string>(((en.tv_sec * 1000000000) + en.tv_nsec)/1000000);
00057 
00058         string regName = (name+yr+mo+da+hr+mm+ms);
00059         servicePool[regName] = service;
00060         return regName;
00061 }
00062 
00063 bool ServicePool::unRegisterService(string name)//unregister will require the unique id
00064 {
00065         map<string,Service>::iterator it;
00066         if(it==servicePool.end())
00067                 return false;
00068         it = servicePool.find(name);
00069         servicePool.erase(it);
00070         return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 vector<string> ServicePool::getServices(string access)//return a list of available services
00074 {
00075         vector<string> services;
00076         map<string,Service>::iterator it;
00077         for(it=servicePool.begin();it!=servicePool.end();++it)
00078         {
00079                 services.push_back(it->first);
00080         }
00081         return services;
00082 }
00083 
00084 Service ServicePool::getService(string regName)
00085 {
00086         return servicePool[regName];
00087 }
